title.rendered: We’re Finalists in the National Care Awards!

content.rendered:
We’re Finalists in the National Care Awards!

We have some exciting news to share with you!

OneTouch Health has been shortlisted for not one but two different awards at this year’s National Care Awards, Tech Innovation of the Year and Supplier of the Year – Tech and Learning.

To say we are proud of this achievement is an understatement, our success is a testament to the efforts of each and every member of our team.

We look forward to celebrating with the other finalists at the awards ceremony on the 29th of November in the ExCel in London!

excerpt.rendered: OneTouch Health is delighted to announce we’ve been shortlisted as finalists in the National Care Awards!
